categories.overlayDescription: Your renown grows. The city factions have been asking for you by name.
You met the full force of the Vex - and you turned them back. Incredible.
Using Golden Age labs to understand the Vex? You and your Ghost make a resourceful team.
Venus is a test that many Guardians fail.
You will be remembered forever as the Shrinebreaker, bane of the Hive.
The Sword of Crota is broken! You have avenged so many lost.
The Hive threat must be answered.

summary.factionDescription:
Complete Vanguard Bounties to unlock powerful gear for purchase.

Achieve high Rank to earn rewards.
summary.vendorDescription: A veteran Titan who coordinates the defense of the City, Zavala helps to outfit and mentor other Titans.

failureStrings: Obtained from the Vault of Glass
Obtained from The Taken King Red Bull promotion
Complete the Refer-A-Friend Quest: "A Tale of Two Guardians."
Eververse Purchase from Custom Horn Kit

summary.vendorDescription: An artist with micromaterial programs, Eva provides Guardians ways to customize their appearance.

categories.overlayDescription: "Crota's soul sleeps again, but his disciples still fight in his name."
"Guardian, I need your help. Crota will return to destroy this world if we do not stop him."
"You've defeated the Fist of Crota, but the threat remains."
"Crota's armies are seeking out the last Warmind. You must stop them from finding Rasputin."
"The Warmind is safe, but Crota's soul is waking."
"Go to the Temple on the Moon, before Crota is made whole."
"I have waited so long for this day. Crota's soul is broken, his reign cut short. Take this, Guardian. I thank you."
"Crota's soul may be gone, but his army still haunts the Earth. Find them in the ruins of Old Russia. End them."
"One by one, the disciples of Crota fall. Well done, Guardian."
"Only Omnigul remains. Crota's vile Will and last remnant of his inner circle. Hunt her down."
"The Spawn of Crota's hold on this land is fragile. His disciples will be forced to fight."
"Omnigul has fallen! Crota's Will is shattered. Maybe now I can find peace."
"Your victories will bring peace to those who fell. I welcome you as a trusted ally of the Hidden."
"Take this Urn into the dark, and fill it with every nightmare and horror the Hive have bred."
"So close. Find the Hated and fill the Urn with his sin." -Eris
"All that remains is to gather their suffering from the edge of an executioner's blade."
"The Urn is full. The final sacrifice is ready. Return to the Moon. Bring me the Eyes of the Forsaken."
"What you do next, no Guardian has dared attempt. I envy your nightmares."
"With your gift, I shall see deeper into the shadows than anyone has dreamed possible."
"Take this armor…it will serve you well in the dark shadows that await."
"Your strength honors the memories of those I've lost.  Few are fit to bear their flag." -Eris

categories.overlayDescription: "Welcome to your Trials, Guardian."
"I am not unimpressed."
"Your capabilities are unquestionable. But can you be focused?"
"This weapon is yours. Do with it as you see fit. I will observe with interest."
